97  HingeJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
98  const Vector3& initAnchorPointWorldSpace,
99  const Vector3& initRotationAxisWorld)
100  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::HINGEJOINT),
101  isUsingLocalSpaceAnchors(false),
102  anchorPointWorldSpace(initAnchorPointWorldSpace),
103  rotationAxisWorld(initRotationAxisWorld), isLimitEnabled(false),
104  isMotorEnabled(false), minAngleLimit(-1), maxAngleLimit(1),
105  motorSpeed(0), maxMotorTorque(0) {}

120  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::HINGEJOINT),
121  isUsingLocalSpaceAnchors(false),
122  anchorPointWorldSpace(initAnchorPointWorldSpace),
123  rotationAxisWorld(initRotationAxisWorld), isLimitEnabled(true),
124  isMotorEnabled(false), minAngleLimit(initMinAngleLimit),
125  maxAngleLimit(initMaxAngleLimit), motorSpeed(0),
126  maxMotorTorque(0) {}
